subject: Football (College)
Football
College Football Playoff National Championship
lead_paragraph: This time of year, we are able to watch the best college teams and the best of the N.F.L. side by side, and it has become apparent that college football has evolved into a sport distinct from the N.F.L.
snippet: This time of year, we are able to watch the best college teams and the best of the N.F.L. side by side, and it has become apparent that college football has evolved into a sport distinct from the N.F.L.
